title: Kids and teens go full throttle for E-bikes as federal oversight stalls
description: Federal rules requiring safety standards for batteries in e-bikes and e-scooters are in limbo.
content:
By Kate Ruder, KFF Health News
LOUISVILLE, Colo. E-bike of Colorado sales manager Perry Fletcher said his sales and repair shop saw an increase in back-to-school sales to young riders and families t… [+7233 chars]
